text:
T. Anandhi  
Mobile: +91  9962174547 , +91 44 222421 47 
Email: anandhi1396@gmail.com  
 
CAREER SUMMARY  
 Flexible and organized educational professional with +12 years of  teaching expertise 
with an un -parallel ability to explain complicated mathematical concepts in an easily 
understandable manner.  
 Talent for employing unique teaching strategies to effectively engage all students and 
foster a fun and fascinating learning en vironment.  
 Encouraging and patient; provide individualized and extracurricular support for students 
that are struggling with learning concepts and mathematical topics.  
  Quickly develops an excellent rapport with students, staff members, and parents to 
produce a friendly and supportive school community.  
SKILLS  
 Differentiated instruction.  
 Math can be fun.  
 Demonstrating real world connections.  
 Proactive educational concepts.  
 Applications in powerful learning.  
 Individual support to struggling students.  
PERSONAL  QUALITIES  
 Creative lesson Planning.  
 Student Motivation.  
 Creative Question.  
 Teach and make awareness of Personal hygiene and Tidiness.  
KEY RESPONSIBILITIES HANDLED  
 Lesson Planning for class VI. VII, VIII, IX . 
 Math Lab activities.  
 Smart classes include discussion session with students.  
 Organize competitive batches  among the topper & conduct examinations.  
 Provide classes on Brain Teaser.  
 After school conduct classes for slow learners.  
 Conduct educational trip to Zoological Park, Museum in Chennai.  
 Prepare  excel worksheets for students record and progress monitoring.  
 Organizing and motivating student of math exhibition and inter school quiz competition.  
 Meeting parents frequently to create good Parent and Teacher relationship on  
development of student progress and achievement.  
 Preparing students for cultural program for School days & National days.  
 Team building among students to support & help each other’s for better learning’s . 
 Create awareness on Skills and personal hygiene & i ts importance.  ACHIEVEMENTS  
 100% result throughout the teaching career.  
 Students enjoy learning math’s with me.  
 Teach moral stories & social activity and nationalism.  
 Has commenting knowledge in Tamil leagues and Indian Histories and historical events.  
 College topper in all the semesters among the arts and science branches, received 
award  and certificates & passed out “First class with Distinction”.  
EMPLOYERS  -  (TEACHING EXPERIENCES)  
1. St. Antony’s matriculation higher secondary school, Little Mount, Chenna i -15 
 
From     June 1997 to April 2003  
Designation  Mathematics Teacher.  
Board  Matriculation VI to X & State Board for XI & XII.  
Classes Handled     VI. VII, VIII, IX & X 
 
2. New Prince Matriculation Higher secondary School, Ullagaram, Chennai - 91 
From     June 2007 to April 2014  
Designation  Mathematics Teacher.  
Board  Matriculation VI to X & State Board for XI & XII.  
Classes Handled     VI. VII, VIII  & IX 
 
Responsibilities:  
 Teaching in three mathematic sections including Statistics, and Trigonometry, Geometry,  
 Business math’s etc..  
 Design and present comprehensive lesson plans, ensuring that each student is able to  
retain and understand the materials in hand.  
 Develop unit based projects that are catered on real -world situations to show students 
the importance of gaining solid education and how Math correlates with everyday life.  
 Conduct class test unit wise and evaluate with stipulated time and give feedback to  
student and well as Parents and School Management.  
 Continual monitoring of student progress.  
 Keeping Progress record, Marks & rank card preparation.  
 Collaborate with co -teachers and Class teachers to integrate new activities and allocate  
effective time &resources for each student development based on their ability.  
 Mentor for students for Science & Math’s exhibitions,  within school & inter schools Level.  
 Training, Preparing and organizing student for School days and National days 
celebration . 
 
 ACADEMIA  
Academic Qualifications (Medium of study  - English)  
 M.Sc.  in Mat hs  from Alagappa University .  
 B.Ed. in Maths & Science  from  Bharathidasan University . 
 B.Sc. Maths  - First class with Distinctions  (76%)  -Bharathi Dasan University  
 + 2 - Passed in 1991 with 72%.  
 SSLC – Passed in 1989 with 79% (Tamil Medium)  
 
 Additional Q ualification: TET qualified in 2013.  
 
 Computer skill : MS office ( Word & Excel, PPT),  Language Known : C/C++
